column2: BRIEF-MDC Holdings Reports Q1 Earnings Per Share $0.68 May 3 (Reuters) - MDC Holdings Inc: * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.53 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * QTRLY HOME SALE REVENUES UP 8% TO $607.7 MILLION FROM $563.5 MILLION * QTRLY DOLLAR VALUE OF NET NEW ORDERS UP 15% TO $863.7 MILLION FROM $750.0 MILLION * QTRLY TOTAL HOME AND LAND SALE REVENUES $607.7 MILLION VERSUS $563.7 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
